metadata.title: CVE-2020-6815 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Mozilla developers reported memory safety and script safety bugs present inFirefox 73. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memory corruption orescalation of privilege and we presume that with enough effort some ofthese could have been exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 74.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-6815` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 74.0+build3-0ubuntu1
firefox-geckodriver - 74.0+build3-0ubuntu1
firefox-mozsymbols - 74.0+build3-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '74.0+build3-0ubuntu1').
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
